rss.title: Anxious Accountant
rss.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Lemon Gose
entry.summary:
Score: 62 (out of 100) / Rank: 48th (out of 121 beers) / A risky choice to try a new beer whilst my hayfever is bad but I have too many new beers to get through as I haven’t got through last month’s Afbeer club yet!
I couldn’t pick up anyhting in the smell but the taste came across as a tangy and refreshing with a mild aftertaste.
10% of all proceeds from this limited edition beer will go st...

entry.title: Point Five
entry.summary:
Score: 45 (out of 100) / Rank: 79th (out of 121 beers) / Probably the loudest beer I have had with a very bubbly head which didn’t settle for a long time.
The taste improved as it finally settled and did have a nice bitter aftertaste, so not really looking to trouble the scorers.
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on my Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey)

entry.title: Nothing But The Rain v.9
entry.summary:
Score: 22 (out of 100) / Rank: 115th (out of 121 beers) / Another Beer trying to cool down and this one was a lively little number.
No real smell but there was a strong sourness up front which didn’t sit well, almost soapy.
After two nice beers before this one left a sour taste and more annoyingly I have no more in the fridge!
Check out how I rank all the beers I have tried on m...

entry.title: Svart/Hvit Melkestout
entry.summary:
Score: 53 (out of 100) / Rank: 68th (out of 121 beers) / Another milkstout and this one has a coffee smell and was dark as expected.
I’ve had Mixed experiences with these stouts but this one was not like a cold coffee, Instead it had a nica matty taste and a strong but pleasant after taste.
It was probably not the best weather for it being so hot but went down well.
Check out ho...

entry.title: To The Sea
entry.summary:
Score: 71 (out of 100) / Rank: 22nd (out of 121 beers) / Hottest day of the year so far very and a cold beer was in order, this one was fizzy and my son sometimes has a sip of my beers and he said he doesn’t like beer but this is his favorite so far.
Perfect for a hot day after the working week!
It had a fruity smell and a clear and crisp taste with a nice bitter aftertaste.
Perfect for a h...
